items.title: Meta Performance Ad Variants
items.description: High-volume static ad variants for Meta (Facebook/Instagram) featuring Cash Out, Balance Shield, and Early Pay product benefits. Multiple copy/visual combos for daily A/B testing.

messages.message: First batch of 15 Meta ad variants ready. Three angles: Cash Out urgency ('Get paid before Friday'), Balance Shield peace of mind ('Never overdraft again'), and Early Pay convenience ('Your paycheck, 2 days early').
Cash Out urgency batch is the strongest — CTR on similar copy has been 2.3x our baseline. Balance Shield needs punchier headlines. Can you A/B test with shorter copy?
V2 with shorter Balance Shield copy uploaded — also added 10 new variants mixing the urgency angle with app screenshot overlays. V3 batch has 50 total variants ready for testing.
V3 is exactly what we need for our daily test cycle. Approved — let's keep this pipeline running weekly.

items.title: Google Display Ad Set
items.description: Responsive display ad set across standard IAB sizes (300x250, 728x90, 160x600, 320x50) promoting EarnIn app download with dynamic product messaging.

messages.message: Google Display V1 — 24 ads across 4 IAB sizes. Each size has 6 variants covering Cash Out, Balance Shield, Early Pay, general brand, app rating, and social proof angles.
The 300x250 CTA button blends into the background — needs way more contrast. Also the app rating stars are unreadable at smaller sizes. The 728x90 leaderboards look great though.
Redesigning the 300x250 and 160x600 with higher-contrast CTAs and larger star ratings. The 728x90 and 320x50 formats are cleared for launch.

items.title: TikTok Performance Creatives
items.description: 15-second vertical video ads for TikTok feed — fast-paced, text-overlay driven, showing Cash Out flow and instant money access. Native TikTok aesthetic.

items.title: YouTube Pre-Roll Ads
items.description: 15-second and 30-second non-skippable pre-roll ads for YouTube. Direct response with app download CTA. Multiple value prop angles.

items.title: Google Search Ad Copy Variants
items.description: Text-based search ad copy variants for Google Search campaigns. Headlines, descriptions, and sitelink extensions across Cash Out, Balance Shield, Early Pay, and general brand terms.

messages.message: 40 search ad copy variants ready. Organized by product line: 12 Cash Out, 10 Balance Shield, 8 Early Pay, 10 general brand. Each includes 3 headline options and 2 description variants.
These are solid. The 'No hidden fees' angle in the general brand set is performing well in our current campaigns. Can you write 5 more variations on that theme?
Added 5 more 'no hidden fees' variants plus 3 'trusted by 3M+ workers' social proof variants. All 48 approved and ready for Google Ads upload.

items.title: Brand TV Spot - 30s
items.description: 30-second brand TV spot for broadcast and streaming. Cinematic storytelling showing real-life moments where EarnIn gives people financial control — payday stress, unexpected bills, gig worker flexibility.

messages.message: Storyboards for three concepts uploaded to Frame.io: 'The Night Shift Nurse' (emotional, 2am paycheck moment), 'The Rideshare Dad' (gig economy angle), 'The College Student' (Gen Z financial stress).
Night Shift Nurse is our winner — the 2am moment where she checks her phone and sees her earnings are available is incredibly powerful. Let's go to production on that one.
Fine cut uploaded. Added the warm golden light when she opens the app — subtle but it shifts the entire mood. Audio is almost final, just fine-tuning the VO mix.
This is the one. The golden light moment is chef's kiss. Approved for broadcast. Minor note: can the end card hold 1 second longer on the app store badges?

items.title: Performance Growth TV - 15s
items.description: 15-second Performance Growth TV spot for CTV platforms (Roku, Hulu, YouTube TV). Includes QR code overlay for direct app download. Fast-paced, benefit-driven, with clear CTA.

messages.message: Performance Growth TV V1 — 15-second spot with QR code for Roku/Hulu/YouTube TV. Opens with the Cash Out value prop, QR appears at second 8.
QR code needs to appear by second 5 — viewers bounce fast on CTV. Also the 'Scan to Download' text is too small for living room viewing distance. Think 10-foot UI.
Restructuring the spot — QR at second 3 with larger text, value prop condensed to the first 2 seconds. Will also add a pulsing animation to draw the eye to the QR code.

items.title: Instagram/TikTok Hero Brand Content
items.description: Vertical format hero brand videos for Instagram Reels and TikTok. Emotional storytelling vignettes showing EarnIn users in real-life moments — not product demos but brand feeling.

items.title: YouTube Brand Anthem - 60s
items.description: 60-second brand anthem for YouTube pre-roll and channel placement. Full narrative arc: the stress of waiting for payday, discovering EarnIn, the relief of financial control. Cinematic quality.

messages.message: YouTube anthem V1 — 60 seconds. Narrative: alarm clock at 4:45am, night shift nurse getting ready, checking bills on the bus, EarnIn notification, relief and smile. Ends with 'You worked today. Get paid today.'
Story structure is great but the middle section (0:20-0:35) drags a bit. Can we tighten the bill-checking montage and add the music swell earlier?
V2 uploaded — tightened the montage by 8 seconds and moved the music pivot to 0:28. Added a subtle phone screen glow effect when she opens the app. V3 is the final with color grade polish.
V3 is perfect. The phone glow and the music swell hitting at the exact moment she sees her balance — absolutely nailed it. Approved for launch.

items.title: Connected TV Companion Banners
items.description: Companion display banners for connected TV ad placements. Shown alongside or after TV spots on Roku, Hulu, and YouTube TV. Includes QR code and app store badges.

items.title: Influencer UGC - TikTok
items.description: TikTok UGC videos from 6 influencers showing authentic EarnIn usage stories. Each creator films their own 'payday moment' — checking their Cash Out, paying a bill early, or avoiding an overdraft. Raw, unpolished aesthetic.

messages.message: First 3 TikTok UGC videos in from creators: @savvysaver (payday moment), @budgetboss (overdraft avoidance story), @giglifemike (gig worker Cash Out). All raw and authentic.
@savvysaver's piece is incredible — you can tell she actually uses the app. @budgetboss is great too. @giglifemike needs a reshoot though — feels too scripted. Can he redo it more naturally?
Mike's doing a reshoot this weekend — told him to just screen record his actual Cash Out and talk over it. Also got the remaining 3 creators' videos in. All 6 should be locked by next week.

items.title: Creator Partnership - Instagram Reels
items.description: Instagram Reels co-branded with partner brands (DoorDash, Uber, Instacart). Creators show how they use EarnIn alongside gig work — earning and accessing pay in real time.

items.title: Reddit Organic Posts
items.description: Platform-native Reddit posts for r/personalfinance, r/povertyfinance, and r/gig_economy. Mix of static infographics and short video clips. Educational tone — financial tips with subtle EarnIn integration.

messages.message: Reddit content V1: 8 posts — 5 static infographics (budgeting tips, overdraft stats, paycheck facts, side hustle money tips, financial wellness checklist) and 3 short video clips.

These nail the Reddit tone — educational and genuinely helpful. The 'overdraft stats' infographic might be too on-the-nose for r/personalfinance though. Can we make the EarnIn callout even more subtle?
Moved the EarnIn mention to a small footer instead of the main graphic on the overdraft post. Also softened the CTA on all posts to 'learn more' instead of 'download now'. V2 ready for posting.
Perfect. These will land well. Approved for distribution across all target subreddits.

items.title: Pinterest Promoted Pins
items.description: Vertical format promoted pins for Pinterest targeting financial wellness, budgeting tips, and side hustle boards. Clean design with EarnIn app screenshots and benefit callouts.

messages.message: Pinterest pins V1: 5 designs — budgeting tips, payday countdown, financial freedom checklist, EarnIn features overview, and side hustle savings tracker.
Putting Pinterest on hold. Our analytics show the Pinterest audience skews older and higher-income than our core user. Redirecting budget to YouTube Shorts and TikTok where our CAC is much better.

items.title: YouTube Shorts - Creator Collabs
items.description: 30-second YouTube Shorts featuring creator collaborations. Financial tip format — '3 things I wish I knew about my paycheck' style content with natural EarnIn mentions.

messages.message: YouTube Shorts V1 — 4 creator collabs: '3 Paycheck Hacks You Need', 'Why I Stopped Overdrafting', 'Gig Worker Money Tips', and 'The App That Changed My Finances'. Each 28-32 seconds.

'Paycheck Hacks' and 'Gig Worker Money Tips' are great. 'Why I Stopped Overdrafting' title feels too advertorial — can we reframe as '3 Things Banks Won't Tell You About Overdrafts'? And 'Changed My Finances' needs more specific details, not vague praise.
Love the reframe. Reshooting with the new angles — the overdraft one will be much stronger with a myth-busting approach. Getting revised cuts from creators by end of this week.
